articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Changelist for the Pixel March Feature Drop leaks - PhoneArena
articles.description: The changelist for the Pixel March Feature Drop has leaked and Pixel 6 series users will get the improved version of Night Sight found on the Pixel 7 line.

articles.title: Just how loud is a rocket launch? - BBC
articles.description: The massive thrust needed to launch a rocket into space creates a lot of noise. How much?
articles.content: Watch footage of the Saturn V launches during Nasa's Apollo programme in the 1960s and 1970s, and one thing that may strike you even more than the polyester-heavy fashions and retro haircuts is just … [+2310 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Howell
articles.title: NASA's IBEX spacecraft bounces back from glitch to study edge of solar system - Space.com
articles.description: NASA reset the spacecraft on March 2 after it spent the past three weeks refusing to respond to commands.
articles.content:
A NASA spacecraft is back to normal after weeks of troubles in space.
NASA's Interstellar Boundary Explorer (IBEX) allowed controllers to reset the computer on March 2, agency officials said on Mond… [+2202 chars]
